author: belfordz
content: not sure if it helps your specific situation, but in the open-rpc spec, all description fields MAY be github-flavored markdown. There is probably not the best support for it inside of playground (yet), but its intended to be supported.

author: belfordz
content: also worth noting, Microsoft has adopted a standard for JSON-Schema descriptions, they use `markdownDescription`
